name: Rock-A-Feller - Vintage Maduro Red - BP Toro
additionalNotes: The Rock-A-Feller Maduro Red cigar is a full bodied 7x38 cigar.  Hints of cocoa, citrus, and wood can be tasted throughout. Wrapped in a toothy Mexican San Andres leaf, Rock-A-Feller Maduro Red cigar  boasts a rich and creamy experience. The Ecuadorian binder and multinational Nicaraguan and PA Broadleaf fillers add a body to the cigar that make you want to smoke another.
